headline: Billionaire Investor Stanley Druckenmiller Just Piled Into a Sector That's Finally Getting Off the Ground. Are These 3 Stocks a Buy?
summary: It's not uncommon for Stanley Druckenmiller to buy a group of stocks in one particular sector.  The billionaire investor has done this frequently with tech stocks and, recently, financials.  Certain conditions favor some sectors over others, so astute investors can detect changes in the cycle and shift their portfolio to pick stocks suited to outperform.
